author: Collider Staff
title: Oscar Winners 2017 – Full List
text:
SHARE 0 
Hollywood’s biggest night has arrived, as the 89th Academy Awards are here. This year’s Oscars ceremony, hosted by Jimmy Kimmel , offers up some suspense in a few categories, but mostly looks to be a big night for the splashy musical La La Land . We’re also no doubt in for some memorable speeches, as the Golden Globes and Screen Actors Guild Awards had their fair share of political moments. Will Kimmel nail the thankless role of Oscar host? Will the performance of one of the best Original Song lineups in years deliver? Can anything beat La La Land ? Stay tuned as we find out. 
We’ll be updating this post as the winners are announced, so below you can peruse the nominees in all 24 categories—just hit refresh as the ceremony wears on to see who wins what. And click here to see how Adam’s predictions are stacking up. Image via Lionsgate
